content: lion brand pattern # 70706ad skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 5 colors 1 ball each *white/multi black gold violet avocado* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing hat is worked separately then stitched to head scarf is worked flat finished with pom-poms some construction required to finish
